metadata.title: CVE-2020-7595 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.description:
xmlStringLenDecodeEntities in parser.c in libxml2 2.9.10 has an infiniteloop in a certain end-of-file situation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-7595` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml2 - 2.9.10+dfsg-5
libxml2-utils - 2.9.10+dfsg-5
python-libxml2 - 2.9.10+dfsg-5
python3-libxml2 - 2.9.10+dfsg-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.9.10+dfsg-5').
